story: As you explore deeper into the abandoned laboratory, you come across a hazardous chemical spill. What do you do?

actions.action: Attempt to safely navigate through the spill
actions.good: Your quick thinking and agility helps you avoid contact with the toxic chemicals. You discover valuable research data and scientific equipment.
actions.bad: Despite your best efforts, you accidentally come into contact with the chemical spill. The fumes cause hallucinations, disorienting you momentarily and hindering your progress through the laboratory.

actions.action: Ignite a nearby fire extinguisher to create a makeshift breathing apparatus
actions.good: With resourcefulness and determination, you find a nearby fire extinguisher and create a makeshift breathing apparatus. You safely navigate through the spill, discovering valuable research data and scientific equipment.
actions.bad: Your attempt to ignite the fire extinguisher causes a small explosion, temporarily deafening you and causing confusion. The chemicals continue to obstruct your path as you struggle to regain your bearings.

actions.action: Leave the laboratory immediately without considering the value of the research data
actions.good: You quickly flee the laboratory, realizing that the chemical spill poses a serious danger. You escape unharmed and can return at a later time.
actions.bad: In your haste to leave, you forget about the valuable research data and scientific equipment. The chemicals continue to obstruct your path as you struggle to regain your bearings.
